org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs

Interface IgfsEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IgniteAsyncSupport, IgniteFileSystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IgfsAsyncImpl, IgfsImpl

    public interface IgfsEx
extends IgniteFileSystem
    Internal API extension for IgniteFileSystem.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.IgniteFileSystem

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        void stop(boolean cancel)
        Stops IGFS cleaning all used resources.
        Parameters:
        cancel - Cancellation flag.

      • context

        IgfsContext context()
        Returns:
        IGFS context.

      • globalSpace

        IgfsStatus globalSpace()
                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Gets global space counters.
        Returns:
        Tuple in which first component is used space on all nodes, second is available space on all nodes.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If task execution failed.

      • globalSampling

        void globalSampling(@Nullable
                    Boolean val)
             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Enables, disables or clears sampling flag.
        Parameters:
        val - True to turn on sampling, false to turn it off, null to clear sampling state.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • globalSampling

        @Nullable
Boolean globalSampling()
        Get sampling state.
        Returns:
        True in case sampling is enabled, false otherwise, or null in case sampling flag is not set.

      • groupBlockSize

        long groupBlockSize()
        Gets group block size, i.e. block size multiplied by group size in affinity mapper.
        Returns:
        Group block size.

      • clientLogDirectory

        @Nullable
String clientLogDirectory()
        Gets client file system log directory.
        Returns:
        Client file system log directory or null in case no client connections have been created yet.

      • clientLogDirectory

        void clientLogDirectory(String logDir)
        Sets client file system log directory.
        Parameters:
        logDir - Client file system log directory.

      • evictExclude

        boolean evictExclude(IgfsPath path,
                     boolean primary)
        Whether this path is excluded from evictions.
        Parameters:
        path - Path.
        primary - Whether the mode is PRIMARY.
        Returns:
        True if path is excluded from evictions.

      • nextAffinityKey

        IgniteUuid nextAffinityKey()
        Get next affinity key.
        Returns:
        Next affinity key.

      • isProxy

        boolean isProxy(URI path)
        Check whether the given path is proxy path.
        Parameters:
        path - Path.
        Returns:
        True if proxy.

      • asSecondary

        IgfsSecondaryFileSystem asSecondary()
        Return the given IGFS as a secondary file system.
        Returns:
        Secondary file system wrapper.

      • await

        void await(IgfsPath... paths)
        Await for any pending finished writes on the children paths.
        Parameters:
        paths - Paths to check.
